p: First, the prototype BgV C-CG was confirmed to have the same mild phenotype as previously reported [ 11]. None of the mice developed any clinical signs of disease at any stage after inoculation. We detected no seroconversion in IP-injected mice, suggesting negligible replication in peripheral tissues, but 33% of IC-injected mice had seroconverted or developed neutralising antibodies, suggesting some replication occurred in neural tissues in these mice ( Fig 5Aâ€“5C).
